questions.question: What comes next in the series: 3, 6, 11, 18, 27, ?
If all roses are flowers and some flowers fade quickly, can we conclude some roses fade quickly?
Find the odd one out: Apple, Orange, Mango, Carrot
A shopkeeper sells an item for ₹240 after giving a 20% discount. What is the marked price?
If 4x - 7 = 25, what is the value of x?
A train travels 120 km in 2 hours and 150 km in 2.5 hours. What is the average speed?
You find a lost mobile phone in a mall. What will you do?
options: Keep it with you and try to unlock it.
Take it to the information desk or lost-and-found.
Post on social media to find the owner.

questions.question: You saw someone cheating in an online test. What would you do?
options: Help them if they’re your friend.
Tell them to stop after the test.

questions.question: A friend shares a private secret about another friend. What do you do?
options: Tell the person whose secret it is.
Ask your friend why they shared it.

questions.question: If your teacher is absent and a fight breaks out in class, what will you do?
If you are part of a group project and one member isn’t contributing, how do you respond?
options: Talk to them politely to cooperate.

questions.question: How do you usually respond when someone gives you constructive criticism?
Your friend is feeling low due to poor exam performance. What will you do?
options: Laugh it off and change the topic.
Tell them to stop worrying too much.
Leave them alone until they feel better.

questions.question: What do you do when you feel anxious before a test?
options: Ignore the feeling and just write.

questions.question: You have to choose between joining your dream college or staying close to family. What will you consider first?
If your exam preparation clashes with your favorite cousin’s wedding, what will you do?
options: Attend the full wedding and risk the exam.
Attend part of it and prioritize study.
Ask the teacher to reschedule your test.
